title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. I, ch. VI, subch. A, pt. 461 - Public Access to Records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. I, ch. VI, subch. A, pt. 461 - Public Access to Records

State Regulations
§ 461.1 - Statement of policy
§ 461.2 - Designation of the records access officer and records appeals officer
§ 461.3 - Subject matter list, location and time for inspection
§ 461.4 - Request for access to records
§ 461.5 - Information exempted or excluded from inspection, denial of access to records and appeal procedure
§ 461.6 - Fees for copies
§ 461.7 to 461.8 - Repealed
§ 461.9 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. I, ch. VI, subch. A, pt. 461

Statutory authority: Parks, Recreation and Historic

Preservation Law, §3.09[8]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
